item.title: Report E-2025030320
item.description:
Report E-2025030320

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-26T21:14:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-24
  • City: MONROE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0846 ET, XPO-LMO notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of Fast Dry yellow epoxy primer released from a metal pail due to improper loading The release impacted inside trailer#317-2673 ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site.
